episode_summary: This episode covers a variety of intriguing topics, including the Aztecs' use of popcorn, China's use of Top Gun footage as propaganda, the loss of master keys at a national laboratory, and the classification of Ken as an accessory to Barbie.

facts.fact: The Aztecs wore necklaces made from popcorn.
In 2011, China tried to pass off a scene from the film Top Gun as footage of its own Air Force.
In 2003, somebody misplaced the master keys to the Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory, which is the home of the fastest computer in the world.
Ken is officially an accessory to Barbie.
